name: Happy Lights
description:
Happy Rails is a game about connecting wires and completing puzzles to enlighten a bulb.

How to play :

1. "Right mouse click" to select either "Placing  Towers/Connecting Wire" mode.

2. "Left click" on placed towers to remove them.

3. After placing towers - you connect wires - by selecting "Connecting wires" and selecting towers in a sequence.

4. To win you need to make sure all bulbs enlighten.
